sourceMeaningMnemonic: Put your <radical>fingers</radical> in somebody's <radical>business</radical> by <kanji>slap</kanji>ping them! This method also works if someone is getting too involved in your business. Slaps are basically your way of doing business with your fingers.
meaningInfo: Imagine giving someone a good, hard slap in the face. You're all up in their business now.
readingMnemonic: <ja>ぼく</ja> is one way to say "I" in Japanese, usually used by dudes. But you're going to use it now when you <kanji>slap</kanji> this guy. Who's in everybody's business, slapping them? <reading><ja>ぼく</ja></reading>.
readingInfo: Say that out loud, using <ja>ぼく</ja>. You're the boss, the boss of slap business.
